mapper.insert: insert into jh_resume (resume_id, resume_pic, resume_name, resume_address, resume_phone, resume_email, resume_page, resume_describe, resume_school, resume_degree, resume_honour, project_name, project_time, user_id, project_describe ) values (#{resumeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{resumePic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resumeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resumeAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resumePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resumeEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resumePage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resumeDescribe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resumeSchool,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resumeDegree,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resumeHonour,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{projectDescribe,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update jh_resume set resume_pic = #{resumePic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, resume_name = #{resumeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, resume_address = #{resumeAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, resume_phone = #{resumePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, resume_email = #{resumeEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, resume_page = #{resumePage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, resume_describe = #{resumeDescribe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, resume_school = #{resumeSchool,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, resume_degree = #{resumeDegree,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, resume_honour = #{resumeHonour,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, project_name = #{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, project_time = #{projectTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, project_describe = #{projectDescribe,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where resume_id = #{resumeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select resume_id, resume_pic, resume_name, resume_address, resume_phone, resume_email, resume_page, resume_describe, resume_school, resume_degree, resume_honour, project_name, project_time, user_id, project_describe from jh_resume where resume_id = #{resumeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select resume_id, resume_pic, resume_name, resume_address, resume_phone, resume_email, resume_page, resume_describe, resume_school, resume_degree, resume_honour, project_name, project_time, user_id, project_describe from jh_resume where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
